irly

>Given that I have two methods of =
my class I need to test, SaveLicense and

Short answer: two tests.

Longer answer: pretend neither were implem=
ented. Try writing the test first. With which test do you start?

By the wa=
y, you absolutely do not need a saved licence to test loading a licence -- =
at least not the way you think. (How?)
